page.title: 17WHEATHAMPSTEAD LIFE-STYLES
page.content: Fashion nowadays are nice.The most fashionable hairstyles for girls are the plaits that start from the top of the head to how ever long your hair is.Perms are in fashion as well.The most fashionable hairdressers in the wheathampstead village is the Hair/Afarye.The people in the Hair/Afarye cut nice hair styles for boys as well.Shoes in fashion in 1985 are either red,black or white and the patterns are either scaly or crinkled.Flat and high shoes are in fashion and the toes of shoes are pointed not rounded.There is only one shoe shop down the village and that is quite small and sells hardly any fashionable shoes.The earrings that people wear nowadays are like smarties.The colours are red,black,white and pink.The beads that people wear are red and white.
